about_the_game:
Embark on an extraordinary quest in Advaria, where the destiny of the realm hangs in the balance. As a seasoned adventurer, your role goes beyond conventional tower defense – now, it's about strategically positioning your magical companions to thwart the relentless onslaught of dark forces.

In the face of looming peril, you must forge alliances and tactically place your companions, each endowed with unique skills and abilities, across the landscape. These aren't just ordinary towers; they are living, breathing allies with their own stories and destinies intertwined with yours. As the savior of Advaria, your decisions in positioning and empowering your companions will shape the course of the battle and the fate of the entire realm.

Navigate the intricacies of both tower defense and RPG elements as you explore the fantastical landscapes of Advaria. Engage in epic battles, unlock the potential of your companions, and delve into the mysteries that permeate the magical world around you. And in the midst of chaos, find solace and connection, as romance blossoms between you and your companions, adding a layer of depth to both the gameplay and narrative.

Advaria beckons – will you rise to the challenge, strategically placing your magical companions to defend against the encroaching darkness? Your journey into this captivating blend of tower defense and RPG awaits, where every decision you make influences not only the outcome of battles but also the fate of a realm steeped in magic and mystery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 1.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Welcome, my Lord, to the cursed kingdom. A land plagued by black magic and creatures that crawl out of the darkness. Once this was a great kingdom. It could be great again. That's all up to you. Enter the world of Advaria - a hero defense game set in a world of fantasy and adventure.
